---
title: "Tune Home Range"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(marlin)
library(tidyverse)
seasons <- 1
patch_area <- 10 #km2
fauna <-
  list(
    "bigeye" = create_critter(
      common_name = "bigeye tuna",
      adult_home_range = 4,
      density_dependence = "local_habitat",
      seasons = seasons,
      fished_depletion = .25,
      resolution = c(10,10),
      steepness = 0.6,
      ssb0 = 42,
      m = 0.4
    )
  )

fauna$bigeye$plot_movement()



```
